entry.title: I Am Co-chairing WPES 2015
entry.content:
I am co-chairing the 2015 Workshop on Privacy in the Electronic Society. The call for papers is currently available on the workshop website, and papers can be submitted through the submission site. Please consider submitting and join a discussion with the top minds in digital privacy.

WPES is co-located with the 22nd ACM Conference on Computer and Communications Security (CCS), which will take place in Denver, Colorado on October 12-16, 2015.

entry.title: The Sniper Attack Won the NRL Berman Award
entry.content: Our paper entitled “The Sniper Attack: Anonymously Deanonymizing and Disabling the Tor Network” won the 47th Annual Alan Berman Research Publication Award! This award was given by the U.S. Naval Research Laboratory on 2015-04-17 for best paper in the Information Technology Division.

entry.title: News Feature Now Active
entry.content: I just changed the blogging feature into a news section, and plan to submit news items via this channel. Sweet.
